name: (Don't) explode yourself!
description:
You're a very powerful mage, maybe a bit too powerful. After your last attempt at creating a spell you launched yourself at terminal velocity straight into a brick wall and now both your legs are broken. Will that restrain you from still experimenting with that spell? Of course not! Join this monochromatic crazy platformer developed in less than a week for the certamente não é outra game jam and remember to (don't) explode yourself!

Controls: W and D to move, mouse to aim and shoot

Source code: https://github.com/murilocarrijosilva/explode
